    • Constructor Detail

      • BtmControl

        public BtmControl(android.content.Context context,
                  com.ihealth.communication.base.comm.BaseComm comm,
                  java.lang.String userName,
                  java.lang.String mac,
                  java.lang.String type,
                  com.ihealth.communication.ins.InsCallback insCallback,
                  com.ihealth.communication.base.comm.BaseCommCallback mBaseCommCallback)
        A construct of BTMControl
        Parameters:
        context - Context.
        comm - class for communication.
        userName - the identification of the user, could be the form of email address or mobile phone.
        mac - valid Ble address(without colon).
        insCallback - Po3 device callback.
        mBaseCommCallback - class for communication.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
        Initializes method
        • Used to create communication channels with BTM.
        • Attention, this method calls after creating the Hs3Control object.
        • In iHealthDevicesManager.createControl(BaseComm btct, String mac, String name, boolean needReadEE) method is invoked for the first time.
        Specified by:
        init in interface DeviceControl

      • getBattery

        public void getBattery()
        Get the BTM battery status
        • Attention, call iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback) firstly.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will not return immediately. After get the battery status, Callback iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String, String, String, String) will be triggered.
        • The action of the callback is BtmProfile.BTM_BATTERY.
        • Thr Keys of message will show in the KeyList of BtmProfile.ACTION_BTM_BATTERY.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)

      • setStandbyTime

        public void setStandbyTime(int hour,
                           int minute,
                           int second)
        Set the standby time
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If set/unset successfully, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)
        Parameters:
        hour - Standby time hours.
        minute - Standby time minute.
        second - Standby time second.

      • setTemperatureUnit

        public void setTemperatureUnit(byte unit)
        Set the temperature unit
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If set/unset successfully, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)
        Parameters:
        unit - temperature unit. The unit of TEMPERATURE_UNIT_C and TEMPERATURE_UNIT_F.

      • setMeasuringTarget

        public void setMeasuringTarget(byte target)
        Set the measuring target
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If set/unset successfully, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)
        Parameters:
        target - measuring target. The target of MEASURING_TARGET_BODY and MEASURING_TARGET_OBJECT.

      • setOfflineTarget

        public void setOfflineTarget(byte target)
        Set the offline target
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If set/unset successfully, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)
        Parameters:
        target - offline target. The target of FUNCTION_TARGET_OFFLINE and FUNCTION_TARGET_ONLINE.

      • getMemoryData

        public void getMemoryData()
        Get the BTM memory data
        • Attention, call iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback) firstly.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will not return immediately. After get the battery status, Callback iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String, String, String, String) will be triggered.
        • The action of the callback is ACTION_BTM_MEMORY.
        • Thr Keys of message will show in the KeyList of KeyList of the action.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        disconnect am device
        Specified by:
        disconnect in interface DeviceControl

        public void destroy()
        Specified by:
        destroy in interface DeviceControl
